gw.pl.util

Class StreamGobbler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gw.pl.util.StreamGobbler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StreamGobbler.StringBufferStreamGobbler, StreamGobbler.StringBuilderStreamGobbler

    public class StreamGobbler
extends java.lang.Thread

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  StreamGobbler.RedirectStreamGobbler
      RedirectStreamGobbler allows you to redirect the input stream to an outputstream, as well as supporting a stringbuffer.
      static class  StreamGobbler.StringBufferStreamGobbler
      This gobbler uses a StringBuffer, which is thread safe, but potentially slow.
      static class  StreamGobbler.StringBuilderStreamGobbler
      This is the simplest, fastest stream gobbler.

      • convertInputStreamToString

        public static java.lang.String convertInputStreamToString(java.io.InputStream streamToRead)
        Converts a stream into a string, swallowing any error that might occur.
        Parameters:
        streamToRead - the stream to be converted
        Returns:
        a string containing the contents of the stream, or a partial, possibly empty string if an ioexception occurs
